channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spreading the Word, from July 4, 1776, to Today
item.description: Philly’s Museum of the American Revolution explores pitfalls, perils, triumphs, and flops as the Declaration of Independence went worldwide.
